attributes.action: UK Government EU Referenda to contain an option “Leave the EU with NO DEAL.”
attributes.additional_details:
A further referendum is being designed to allow only prolonged membership of the EU or to stay within EU Controls. Conspirators are prepared to deny the public considering leaving the EU - the will of 17.4 million people
This petition is for a MANDATE to include “Leave with No Deal” as an option of membership of the EU
A referendum without a “Leave with NO DEAL” should result option in the undersigned voting for a new party created by Nigel Farage to remove anti-British democracy from Parliament
attributes.background: Following monstrous demonstrations of duplicity and arrogance in Members of Parliament following their‘defeat’ in the UK 2016 Referendum, I found myself wondering how to motivate some Con/Lab/Lib/Scots conspirators against the 2016 Referendum results.
